About the Company: Automotive Stampings & Assemblies Ltd is a manufacturer and supplier of sheet metal components, welded assemblies and modules for automobiles. Their product range includes Body-In-White (BIW) structural panels, Skin panels, Fuel tanks, Oil sumps & Suspension parts, mainly for passenger and commercial vehicles.The company also manufactures sheet metal components for tractors.Their customers are some of the prestigious vehicle manufacturers like Tata Motors, General Motors India, Fiat India Automobiles, Piaggio Vehicles ,John Deere Equipment and Ford Motor Company (UK).
